Story :

Ming is able to see ghosts and contact to the dead since she was a little girl. It&#039;s been 15 years that she attempts to escape from a mysterious ghost that keeps following her. Until she meets a young doctor named But, who visits her for a purpose. But knows that Ming can contact to the dead, so he wants her to find the reason behind the death of his father. While his father&#039;s death is reported as committing suicide, But believes it&#039;s a murder. The appearance of But brings back the terrible memory in the past of Ming&#039;s life and now she&#039;s going to face the truth that is more terrible than the ghosts.
